document.full_text: a semi-retired federal judge was sentenced on friday to 30 days in prison for helping an exotic dancer buy illegal drugs, telling her "i'll watch your back any time."
document.title: semi-retired judge sentenced for helping dancer buy drugs
lines_and_colors: a semi-retired federal judge was sentenced on friday to 30 days in prison for helping an exotic dancer buy illegal drugs, telling her "i'll watch your back any time."
